00015 enum NonmemTranslator::MODEL_SPEC NonmemTranslator::detModelType()
00016 {
00017   DOMElement  * spksouce = getSourceTree()->getDocumentElement();
00018   DOMNodeList * nonmems  = spksouce->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_NONMEM );
00019   if( !nonmems->getLength() > 0 )
00020     {
00021       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00022       sprintf( mess, "Missing <%s> element.", XML.C_NONMEM );
00023       SpkCompilerException e ( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00024       throw e;
00025     }
00026 
00027   DOMElement * nonmem = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( nonmems->item(0) );
00028 
00029   DOMNodeList * models = nonmem->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_MODEL );
00030   if( models->getLength() != 1 )
00031     {
00032       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00033       sprintf( mess, "Missing <%s> element.", XML.C_MODEL );
00034       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR, mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00035       throw e;
00036     }
00037 
00038   DOMElement  * model = dynamic_cast<DOMElement*>( models->item(0) );
00039 
00040   enum MODEL_SPEC modelSpec;
00041   unsigned int advan;
00042 
00043   //
00044   // All ADVANs fit to the compartmental modeling framework.
00045   //
00046   if( model->hasAttribute( XML.X_ADVAN ) )
00047     {
00048       XMLString::textToBin( model->getAttribute( XML.X_ADVAN ), advan );
00049       assert( advan > 0 );
00050 
00051       modelSpec = static_cast<MODEL_SPEC>( advan );
00052     }
00053   else
00054     {
00055       DOMNodeList * preds   = model->getElementsByTagName( XML.X_PRED );
00056       if( preds->getLength() < 1 )
00057     {
00058       char mess[ SpkCompilerError::maxMessageLen() ];
00059       sprintf( mess, "Missing <pred>!" );
00060       SpkCompilerException e( SpkCompilerError::ASPK_SOURCEML_ERR,
00061                   mess, __LINE__, __FILE__ );
00062       throw e;
00063     }
00064 
00065       modelSpec = PRED;
00066     }
00067   return modelSpec;
00068 }
